mapper.update: UPDATE cinema_baidu SET baidu_city_name = #{baiduCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, baidu_area = #{baiduArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, baidu_city_name, baidu_area, city_id, city_name, area_id, area_name, name, address FROM cinema_baidu WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT id, baidu_city_name, baidu_area, city_id, city_name, area_id, area_name, name, address FROM cinema_baidu
